overview:
Luke is the CEO and founder of TigerSpike,

Luke oversaw TigerSpike’s growth from a 3 person mobile technology company in 2003, to the worldâ€™s leading personal media company with over 100 staff across offices in Sydney, London, New York and Singapore. Before TigerSpike, Luke completed a degree in Computer Science with Management from Kings College, London. Luke then went on to qualify as a Chartered Accountant with KPMG in London before moving to Australia and ultimately becoming manager in charge of KPMGâ€™s Information, Communication, and Entertainment service line for its Information Risk Management division. In his spare time Luke sails competitively, completing the Sydney to Hobart yacht race in 2004. Luke is also the 2009 world whistling champion!
